para: The following changes have occurred for WS MDS Trigger Service since the last stable release, &previousversion;:

listitem.simpara: Multiple Triggers per data source aggregation is now supported. Each trigger's Matching Rule will be evaluated against the incoming message
Support for XML Namespace resolution in the Matching Rule Xpath statement. This allows namespace prefixes to be specified in the TriggerRule XPath matching rule string parameter.
Triggers are now created/configured in a completely different way from previous versions. Since they are no longer read from static configuration files, they are created dynamically as needed.
Some parameter names have been changed, added, or removed.
